amendment.description: To provide for an extension of the temporary increase in payments for medicare home health services furnished in a rural area.

vote.text: Amendment SA 58 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 58 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Collins. (consideration: CR S1411-1412; text: CR S1411) To provide for an extension of the temporary increase in payments for medicare home health services furnished in a rural area.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 58 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 58 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Collins.
